actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend various laws relating to housing and urban development so as to repeal the provisions which presently require compliance with the Davis-Bacon Act in the conduct of federally financed activities thereunder.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of various laws relating to housing and urban development which presently require compliance with the Davis-Bacon Act (rate of wages for laborers and mechanics) in the conduct of federally financed activities thereunder.

titles.title: A bill to amend various laws relating to housing and urban development so as to repeal the provisions which presently require compliance with the Davis-Bacon Act in the conduct of federally financed activities thereunder.
